name: Luke Leighfield | New Season | Deluxe CD Album
description: Released: 26th March 2012 Track listing: 1. Slow Down 2. New Season 3. It's You 4. Whispering 5. Patience 6. Time 7. The One Thing 8. Live for More 9. Garde Ta Foy 10. Do Not Settle Additional details: - Packaged in a recycled matt card digifile, including 20-page photo book with photos from the album recording process by Tom Price, and a 4-page lyric booklet, all printed on recycled paper - Mixed by Peter Miles (Futures / The King Blues / Canterbury) - See a flick-thru video of the packaging here - Comes with a free A2 New Season poster, stickers and postcards N.B. Â£1 from every sale of New Season will be donated to Christian Aid, who work to bring an end to poverty around the world.

name: Luke Leighfield | Have You Got Heart? | Deluxe CD Album
description: Released: 17th November 2009 Track listing: 1. By My Side 2. Have You Got Heart? 3. Every Day 4. I Won't Look Back 5. If You So Much As Smile 6. 60,000 Miles 7. King and Queen 8. When You've Reached Your Limit 9. On To Something 10. Lullaby Additional details: - Packaged in a limited edition (/1000), hand-numbered, deluxe 40-page book (including CD) - Featuring exclusive photography from the recording of the album by Tom Price - Produced by Peter Miles (The King Blues/Futures/Canterbury) and Luke Leighfield - Package design by twoducksdisco - See a flick-thru video of the packaging here

name: Luke Leighfield | Fan The Flames | CD Album
description: Released: 3rd December 2007 Track listing: 1. Fan The Flames 2. If I Try 3. If You Haven't Got Anything To Say 4. Simple Things 5. Hope 6. Home 7. Don't Break Your Back 8. Scared 9. I Got Soul 10. It Goes On 11. Time To Go Additional details: - Packaged in a jewel case with deluxe 16-page photo booklet - Photography by James Looker - Produced by Dan Halliday and Luke Leighfield

name: Luke Leighfield & Jose Vanders | Split EP (with poster)
description: Released: 19th September 2011 Track listing: 1. Metal Detector (Luke covers Jose) 2. Every Day (Jose covers Luke) 3. Man On Wire (Luke covers Jose) 4. Have You Got Heart? (Jose covers Luke) Additional details: - Limited edition EP (/1000) featuring Luke Leighfield and Jose Vanders covering two of each other's songs - Produced by Ant West (Futures) - Package design by Nicholas Stevenson - Pre-orders include a limited edition poster signed by Luke and Jose - You can hear the EP on SoundCloud

name: Sam Isaac | Eighteen Nine : Early Recordings | CD Album
description: Released: 1st August 2007 Track listing: 1. These Last Few Months 2. Compass Scattered Love 3. Hospital Bed 4. Secret State 5. Make It Now 6. Nineteen 7. Photos In The Dark 8. Getting Close 9. What Good Did That Do? 10. Contingency Plan 11. Eighteen Nine 12. If You Choose To Love 13. Take Care 14. I wore Your Scarf 15. Cognac Box 16. Intermission 17. Cheeks 18. Untitled 19. I Won't Let You Go (I Can't) 20. In The Rush Additional details: - Epic 20-song collection of Sam Isaac's early work. - Photography by Dave Shearn - Produced by Will Howick - Package design by twoducksdisco
